item.name: 用户名登录-不输入密码
用户名登录-未注册用户

script.exec: // Example with a full fledged SDK Request        const my_request = {          url: "http://localhost:8080/matdata/v1/user/login?username=administrator&password=xA123456",          method: "GET",          header: {'Content-Type': 'json/application'},          body: {            mode: 'raw',            raw: ""          }        };        pm.sendRequest(my_request, function (err, res) {          if (err) {              console.log(err);          } else {                        pm.environment.set('user',res.json().data.username);          pm.environment.set('token',res.json().data.usertoken);          pm.environment.set('user_objectId',res.json().data.objectId);          }        });

// Example with a full fledged SDK Request        const my_request = {          url: "http://localhost:8080/matdata/v1/user/login?username=administrator&password=xA123456",          method: "GET",          header: {'Content-Type': 'json/application'},          body: {            mode: 'raw',            raw: ""          }        };        pm.sendRequest(my_request, function (err, res) {          if (err) {              console.log(err);          } else {                        pm.environment.set('user',res.json().data.username);          pm.environment.set('token',res.json().data.usertoken);          pm.environment.set('user_objectId',res.json().data.objectId);          }        });
